name: GridList
description: An auto-generated grid list that calculate item size according to given props

props.name: numColumns
props.description: Number of items to show in a row (ignored when passing maxItemWidth)

props.name: maxItemWidth
props.description: Allow a responsive item width to the maximum item width

props.name: listPadding
props.description: List padding (used for item size calculation)

props.name: containerWidth
props.description: Pass when you want to use a custom container width for calculation

props.name: keepItemSize
props.description: whether to keep the items initial size when orientation changes, in which case the apt number of columns will be calculated automatically.

hero.title: GridList
hero.description:
GridList display a collection of GridListItems organized in a repeated grid pattern. 

GridList allows users to scan content based on images and compare items within a collection.

items.title: Option 1 - Max Item Width
items.description: Set maximum width of a single item, and amount of items in a row will be set automatically according to screen width.  Columns number will be dynamic according to how many items fit the screen.

items.title: Option 2 - Column Number
items.description: Set amount of columns, and items width will be automatic according to screen width. Columns number will be fixed.

sections.title: Spec
sections.description:
markdown: 
### Spacing between items
Horizontal gutter by default is minimum S4 and can be modified.  
Vertical gutter is equal to horizontal gutter.
### Last item counter
Once grid reaches Max of items, the last item should get an overlay color and number of remaining items.  
The item content shouldn’t be displayed.  
This state is available in the MediaItem and Avatar components.
